name: vtubestudio
description: A TypeScript implementation of the VTube Studio WebSocket API.

scripts.prepare: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run bundle && npm run build:docs
scripts.bundle: npm run bundle:esm && npm run bundle:iife
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && git push && npm publish

author: Hawkbar
